QuestData.Title: Fire From the Sky
QuestData.Description: The remnants of Schnottz's organization persist here on the Maker's Ascent, making the region deadly to any who draw near.$b$bThere's plenty of ammunition, but without a good spotter, I'm just firing blind.$b$bHop in and give me a hand here. Those soldiers won't know what hit them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Board the Confiscated Artillery and use it to kill 100 Schnottz Infantrymen.
